TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControl/TabPageCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 包含 对象的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此集合中的选项卡页的顺序反映在相关的选项卡的顺序控件。The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order of tabs in the related control. 若要更改控件中的选项卡的顺序，必须通过删除它们，并将它们插入到新索引处更改它们在集合中的位置。To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator
public: virtual System::Collections::IEnumerator ^ GetEnumerator();

summary.span: 返回集合中所有选项卡页的枚举。

span.span: Returns an enumeration of all the tab pages in the collection.
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建包含快照的集合的枚举。This method creates an enumerator that contains a snapshot of the collection. 你可以通过更改枚举数; 更改的集合但是，多个枚举器可同时访问同一集合。You can change the collection by changing the enumerator; however, multiple enumerators can simultaneously access the same collection. 因此，更改集合 （直接或通过另一个枚举器） 可以导致或引发异常。Changing the collection (either directly or through another enumerator) can thus cause or to throw an exception. 从在同一时间相同集合创建的两个枚举器可以包含不同的快照。Two enumerators created from the same collection at the same time can contain different snapshots. 从枚举器删除对象也它们从集合中移除。Removing objects from the enumerator also removes them from the collection.

summary.span: 返回带有指定键的 的第一个匹配项的索引。

span.span: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the with the specified key.

returns.span: 如果找到带有指定键的选项卡页，则为其第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连续，最后调用返回索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，如果没有匹配项，从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 属性对应的密钥中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 键比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应的密钥中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 方法允许您创建并在指定的位置插入选项卡页。The method allows you to create and insert a tab page at a specified location. 若要添加选项卡页，而无需指定集合中的特定位置，使用方法。To add a tab page without specifying a particular position in the collection, use the method. 如果你想要添加到集合的项的数组，使用方法。If you want to add an array of items to the collection, use the method. `imageKey`参数引用中的图像属性。The `imageKey` parameter refers to an image in the property of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应的密钥中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 键比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，返回`null`。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例最初创建有三个。The following code example initially creates a with three . 此示例使用方法来删除单个选项卡页，专门`tabPage2`从`tabControl1`控件集合。This example uses the method to remove a single tab page, specifically `tabPage2` from the `tabControl1` controls collection. 请注意，属性可以获取`tabControl1`控件集合，以便添加和移除此集合中的选项卡页。Notice that the property gets the `tabControl1` controls collection to add and remove tab pages from this collection. 使用和具有此示例中的命名空间。Use the and namespaces with this example.
